programme.title: Chef @ Home Ep12
programme.desc: Local Chef teaches husband and wife how to buy at market and prepare quick and healthy Sarawak cuisine at home.

programme.title: Kediaman Agro Ep12
programme.desc: KEDIAMAN AGRO merupakan program dokumentari yang menumpukan kepada teknologi penanaman makanan berskala kecil seperti di kawasan rumah, mahupun mini kebun.

programme.title: Above & Beyond Ep3
programme.desc: This documentary highlight the individuals within the NGOs who go above and beyond their own ways to show love and kindness towards the community.

programme.title: Tanah Syurga Ep2
programme.desc: Kepulangan Andy ke Sarawak demi menjaga ibunya yang sakit disamping mengusahakan tanah pusaka peninggalan arwah ayah telah menimbulkan reaksi negatif abangnya, Jamal.

programme.title: Ertugrul S5 Ep46
programme.desc: A 13th-century Turkish warrior agrees to fight the enemies of a sultan in exchange for land when a good deed endangers his clan.

programme.title: (L) Berita TVS@7
programme.desc: Berita TVS membawakan berita yang menyeluruh dan padat dengan perspektif yang lebihmenyegarkan.

programme.title: Cuti-Cuti Sarawak Tersayang Kamek Ep5
programme.desc: Hosted by Vincent and Elya, takes viewers to lesser-known Sarawak travel locations like Long Bedian, Kabong, and Similajau, providing breathtaking visuals and informative narration about local lifestyles.

programme.title: Sepana & Spray Ep6
programme.desc: Sebuah program yang mengetengahkan pemilik bengkel ubah suai motosikal. Dalam program ini, mereka diberikan tugasan untuk mengubah suai sebuah motosikal mengikut cita rasa dan kreativiti mereka.

programme.title: A House Of Its Time Ep7
programme.desc: Take a look at some of the most beautiful residential houses in Asia. Also, learn about their architectural heritage and their historical and social importance.

programme.title: Akik's Stove Ep12
programme.desc: Akiks Stove is a cooking show in the outdoors featuring local ingredients sourced from the jungle. Part cooking & foraging, the chef will teach how to look for local ingredients in the jungle or river.

programme.title: Time Traveller Luke Ep20
programme.desc: The show is about Luke and his friend, Jean that time-travel to many parts of the world to prevent Indiana, a thief that tried to steal and collect all the relics and treasures in the world.

programme.title: Menghilir Rajang S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Kehidupan penduduk yang tinggal di sepanjang sungai Rajang, Sarawak. Kedudukan geografinya yang strategik menjadikan sungai ini sebagai sumber ekonomi, pendidikan, perhubungan dan produk pelancongan

programme.title: Nang Nyaman! Ep6

programme.desc: Program pertandingan sukan basikal lasak yang dianjurkan oleh Broad Vision Solution Sdn.Bhd dengan kerjasama Persatuan Basikal Sarawak dan Sarawak Sports Cooperation bersama Kerajaan Negeri Sarawak.

programme.title: Order Up! Ep6

programme.title: Dollah Superstar

programme.title: Pening-Pening Lalat
programme.desc: Dino adalah banduan yang berjaya melarikan diri dari penjara. Polis menyiarkan berita mengenainya dan menawarkan hadiah RM10,000 kepada sesiapa yang berjaya menangkapnya. Jadi Dino bersembunyi di dalam hutan di mana dia bertemu Zakaria dan Aliza.

programme.title: Kasih Yang Ternoda

programme.title: Sate
programme.desc: Terdapat seorang gadis di sebuah bandar yang menjalani kehidupan hariannya dengan menjual sate di warung bapanya. Dan di sebelah warung tersebut terdapat sebuah kedai membaiki peralatan letrikdimilik oleh seorang pemuda. Mereka berkawan rapat dan masing-masing menyimpan perasaan kerana malu untuk berterus-terang.

programme.title: Kawan Aku Mati Dalam Rumah Sewa Dia
programme.desc: Kawan Aku Mati Dalam Rumah Sewa Dia mengisahkan tentang Acik yang bekerja sebagai penjahit kostum hantu yang sanggup membayar sewa kepada ayah tirinya sendiri iaitu Pak Brahim hanya kerana dia tidak ingin berkongsi rumah dengan adik-beradiknya. Suatu hari, Wan menelefon Achik untuk diajak pergi bercuti di Terengganu sempena menyambut kepulangan kawannya iaitu Akmal yang baru pulang dari luar negara. Achik menolak ajakan Wan sebaliknya mengajak rakannya itu untuk datang bercuti bersama di rumahnya.

programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep80
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: An Exciting Offer Season 4 Ep9
programme.desc: The reality show of this season is to focus 10 young architectural interns to work in Beijing Institute of Architectural Design for a month. ChunYe Zhang, Nicholas Tse, Jason Zhang, Xueqin Li, Gabrielle Guan, etc. formed as cheer up team to witness their passionate growth process.

programme.title: Perfect Match (2018) Ep5
programme.desc: The brand new version of "Perfect Match", 24 female guests will be divided into think about zone and observation zone. The male guests will not show their appearance at that moment. They will have conversation with the female guests through the "second scene". All guests by two-way choice get to decide if they are the right persons to couple up.

programme.title: Go! Dreamland Ep8
programme.desc: Three celebrities, Jeff Chang, Ele Yan, Sean Tang, organized a five-day and four-night trip to Lijiang Ancient City. They completed immersive creation to develop a sound-seeking journey.

programme.title: Classical Pieces As My Guide Ep8
programme.desc: Luo Yizhou, Linghe Zhang, Xiaolong Zhang, David Wang, Dylan Wang, Jenny Zeng are invited to the creation place of masterpieces handed down from generation to generation. The connotation is expressed in a modern way, highlighting the continuation and inheritance of Chinese civilization.

programme.title: Perfect Match (2018) Ep6
programme.desc: The brand new version of "Perfect Match", 24 female guests will be divided into think about zone and observation zone. The male guests will not show their appearance at that moment. programme.title: Singing With Legends Season 5 (Live) Ep4
programme.desc: Celebrities from different generations like A-Lin, Wowkie Zhang, Harlem Yu, Jiaqi Ma, Michael Wong, Huiling So, Krystal Chen, Mike Tsang, Pax Congo, Momo Wu, etc., were invited to perform in a brand-new upgraded "blind selection pairing" mode. They broke through themselves in intergenerational inheritance and era blending, creating the warmest and most moving music feast.

programme.title: Share Life Ep19
programme.desc: Focusing on the life of the youngsters with Shanghai as the story background, six guests of different ages, occupations and genders would share life for 105 days because of various reasons. The observation group includes G.E.M., Li Dan, Chen Jian Bin, Wei Da Xun, Zeng Ke Ni, and Yang Li.

programme.title: The Feast Season 2 Ep19
programme.desc: Jam Hsiao, Meng Jia, Jiulang Yang and Ziyi Ao bring you all to The Feast! They visit different local friends around to Hangzhou, Zhengzhou, Fuzhou, Shantou, Chongqing, etc. by using food as a clue to explore the cultural characteristics.

programme.title: Hit It Off Ep12
programme.desc: A group of actors and partners study advanced reality shows. Famous directors and stars, like Stanley Kwan, Francis Ng, and Ann Hui act as "producers" to give advice for them. More than a dozen participating young actors, will pair up with other actors through common life and training.

programme.desc: The China Showbiz gathers together a wide range of wonderful TV artistic works and directs viewers into a fabulous world of arts through works appreciation and review.

programme.title: China News
programme.desc: It concentrates on the latest news and social changes happening in china and all over the world

programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Report the Asia News on Asian view

programme.title: Memory of China Ep157
programme.desc: Memory of China is the first history program of China, the TV program unveils secrets of important historical events, mega projects and the untold stories behind those crucial decisions of this country.

programme.title: Across the Strait Ep304
programme.desc: The Across the Strait traces the much-discussed issues across the Strait, reflects the will of the citizens on two sides of the Strait and details the Chinese Governments policy of one country, two systems in a bid to enhance the Taiwan fellowmens understanding of the Mainland China.

programme.title: China News
programme.desc: It concentrates on the latest news and social changes happening in china and all over the world

programme.title: Focus Today
programme.desc: Traces the current affairs from china and the world

programme.title: Walking around China Ep134
programme.desc: It focuses on the latest changes in China from a humanistic perspective, pays attention to new phenomena, new fashions, and new things around ordinary Chinese people,

programme.title: Network News
programme.desc: Network News is a 30min news, news about china and the world.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep469
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Lost Romance(M) Ep1819
programme.desc: Xiao-En Zheng is an ordinary editor for romance novels who always dreams that one day a rich hunk would come and save her. One of her enjoyable times is to peek out the window to see Tian-Xing He, who is a CEO working in the next building. Her world changes completely when an accident occurs. She time travels into her novel. Not knowing where she is, she sees Tian-Xing He walking towards her.

programme.title: Player in Kaohsiung (M) Ep5859
programme.desc: The name Kaohsiung has entered into a century of history since it has been renamed from Da Gou. This year, the National Day fireworks will be held again in Kaohsiung after 20 years passed. SETI has specially produced a new travelogue for Kaohsiung, leading the audience to visit the most popular, charming, and unique places in Kaohsiung. Through the lens, the century-old glory of Kaohsiungs [One-Hundred] is presented profoundly. The new season of "Player in Kaohsiung" invites many hosts and celebrities, including Yao Yao, Chang Chin Lan, Daniel Chen, David Wu, Ada Chang, Fay Wu, and Kua Kua, visit the 38 administrative districts of Kaohsiung to explore the sensational stories of the people in the alleys, deeply explore the professional spirit of the Greater Kaohsiung area, the traditions and customs of the aboriginal people, the living beside the farms and ports, and the humanism nurtured by Kaohsiungs century-old history.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep118
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1056
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Battle Tour(M) Ep22
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep877878
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep694
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep470
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Happy Enemy(M) Ep2021
programme.desc: Pei-Pei Wu and Yu-Hsuan Lee have been comparing with each other since childhood. They had a crush on each other but later became rivals because of an accident. They both wished each other would disappear from their lives; however, they are neighbors. Pei-Pei and Yu-Hsuan have been fighting, yet they inevitably fell into the destined love with each other. If fighting against each other is a way of communication and caring, then these quarrelsome lovers are getting closer and growing together. When they gradually start to let go of their competitive attitude that is full of hostility, they even start to click with each other!

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3395
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep47324733
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep209210
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1858
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2105
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker (M) Ep9
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience. Hosts will travel around the world to introduce the hidden gems & delicious local food in each place.

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: Men on the Dragon
programme.desc: When massive layoffs are expected, four middle-aged men pledge their loyalty to the company by joining the newly formed dragon boat team. As the four embark on their rigorous training, they are forced to face their respective mid-life issues. The process rekindles their long-lost fighting spirit, and they begin to welcome lifes challenges.

programme.title: Flashover
programme.desc: This is based on a true story. A sudden earthquake hits the gas pipes in an industrial park, triggering massive explosions and engulfing the neighboring area in flames. When the Fire Rescue Force reaches the scene, firefighters must fight against the flames and time, as they commit to safeguard lives with their own.

programme.title: Think Big Big
programme.desc: Moon is a plus-sized girl working happily as a mascot at a theme park. That is until one day she accidentally joins a weight loss competition, with her remarkable transformation turning her into the "Nations Goddess". Netizens have their eyes glued on her, turning her life upside down, and Moon has to find a way to be happy again.

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Master Luo, a washed-up stuntman, trains his beloved horse Red Hare to be a stunt horse. Due to his debts though, Red Hare may be taken away by the debtors. Master Luo has no choice but to seek help from his estranged daughter, and the incident ends up becoming a golden opportunity for them to reconcile.

programme.title: Kungfu Stuntmen
programme.desc: Hong Kong action cinema is famous for its real kung fu moves performed by a group called Kung Fu Stuntmen. This docu-film pays tribute to the generations of kung fu stuntmen, with the crew spending over two years digging archives and interviewing many talents, including the most prominent masters like Jackie Chan, Donnie Yen and Sammo Hung.

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: 12 Golden Ducks
programme.desc: This is a comeback story about the misadventures of a group of gigolos, led by Future, trying to make their mark in Hong Kong. As with any profession, they have their share of setbacks, but their ability to find laughter within the tears reflects the drive, passion and the indomitable spirit of the Hong Kong people.

programme.title: Bell Chamber
programme.desc: Based on a Thai ghost story of Kuman Thong, the film revolves around a woman who has caused the death of her young brother a long time ago. When she returns to the old house where they lived before, she finds herself haunted by the spirit of her young brother wanting to take revenge for his death.

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Master Luo, a washed-up stuntman, trains his beloved horse Red Hare to be a stunt horse. Due to his debts though, Red Hare may be taken away by the debtors. Master Luo has no choice but to seek help from his estranged daughter, and the incident ends up becoming a golden opportunity for them to reconcile.

programme.title: Kungfu Stuntmen
programme.desc: Hong Kong action cinema is famous for its real kung fu moves performed by a group called Kung Fu Stuntmen. This docu-film pays tribute to the generations of kung fu stuntmen, with the crew spending over two years digging archives and interviewing many talents, including the most prominent masters like Jackie Chan, Donnie Yen and Sammo Hung.

programme.title: Sex and the Beauties
programme.desc: It is said that Hong Kong is a sexy and sexual city where life is breathtakingly fast but glamorous. Fear of marriage, single & successful psychiatrist, Selina and other beauties seek for love and happy endings.

programme.title: Still Human
programme.desc: Evelyn, a Filipino domestic helper, moves to Hong Kong to work for Cheong Wing, a divorcee paralyzed in a construction accident. Becoming unlikely friends, the two discover shared humanity that helps them face lifes mounting hardships.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963 and ruthlessly built an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: The Trough
programme.desc: Yu Chau is a cop who has gone very deeply undercover within the triads. When he accidentally kills one of his pals in an operation, he runs off into the wild to lick his wounds. Upon his return, he teams up with fellow officers Jim and Jackie to catch a triad Boss, only to unveil collusion with government officials at the highest level.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the faade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: Love is Cold
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in Macau, a teenage boy and girl kill someone and clean up the crime scene together. The girl is from China and is bullied in her new school. The boy is from a complicated family who has close ties to the gangster world. They are instantly attracted to each other when they met but who did they kill and will they get away with it?

programme.title: Shaolin Kung Fu Kids
programme.desc: Bo is separated from other Shaolin disciples when they are on the way to perform. He meets a family from Hong Kong and gets help from them. When this family faces difficulties, Bo uses his kung fu to help them solve those problems.

programme.title: Love for Life
programme.desc: Set in a small Chinese village, where an illicit trade in human blood has resulted in the spread of HIV, De Yi and Qin Qin are two fellow AIDS sufferers who unexpectedly fall in love with each other and risk everything to pursue a last chance at happiness...

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Dailys Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: She's a Man. He's a Woman.
programme.desc: This is a romantic comedy about a quarrelsome and loving couple whose spirits are being swapped over after a thunderstorm. The sexy lady finds herself carrying an ugly mans spirit, and vice versa. Can they switch their spirits back, or do they need to get use to the situation for the rest of their lives?

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of The Way We Dance features the plight of Hong Kongs grassroots performing artists as they fight against the governments plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: Heroic Duo
programme.desc: Police officer Ken needs help to solve a grisly crime that the offender has no recollection of committing. Ken seeks out Jack, a former psychologist who is now imprisoned. Forming an uneasy truce, this unconventional duo sets out to find the man responsible. It is at this time that Ken falls into a trap set up by Jack

programme.title: I Love You, You're Perfect, Now Change!
programme.desc: Catch this comedy-musical adapted from the Broadway classic I LOVE YOU, YOURE PERFECT, NOW CHANGE consisting of 12 independent stories from the viewpoints of individuals, families and societies all exploring the timeless theme of love!

programme.title: Mad Fate
programme.desc: A Master fortune teller predicts that Tung, a born psychopath, will be imprisoned for murder and tries to change his fate. A veteran detective believes Tung is a psychopathic serial killer after witnessing him kill a cat, and pursues him relentlessly. Can the Master change Tungs mad fate?

programme.title: The Nightmares
programme.desc: A young and successful doctor is tortured by recurrent nightmares after a child patient dies accidentally. The line between dreams and reality starts to blur when the faceless killer from these nightmares comes to life and hunts her down.

programme.title: Coffin Homes
programme.desc: Three bizarre tales intertwine in this horror satire set against the housing crisis of Hong Kong, where soaring property prices have driven dwellers to take every insane effort necessary to secure a cramped space, even if it means sharing the same roof with the dead!

programme.title: Shaolin Prince
programme.desc: As the names of Chang Cheh and Liu Chia-liang became legendary, all-too-often the name of their equally valued collaborator, Tang Chia, is omitted. That may be, because, unlike the previous pair, the veteran kung-fu choreographer only went on to direct three movies of his own. Of course, that makes this trio all the more special, and this first effort perhaps the most special of all. It may be an eye-filling, mind-bending martial arts tale of two royal princes battling for the rightful recovery of the throne, but it's also a party, where Tang invites two cinematographers, three editors, and no less than five other choreographer friends to almost literally shoot the works. The results are kung-fu configurations not only never seen before, but never even imagined!

programme.title: The Kingdom and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the Emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. When he sends for Li one year later, she was too ill to withstand the arduous journey and arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: Perils Of The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: The titanic team of Director Chu Yuan and Novelist Ku Lung chose to give their hero (Ti Lung) a whole new cliffhanger-fraught adventure featuring a mysterious swordsman, a sensual swordswoman, an imperial assassin, a ghost mansion, a booby-trapped tunnel, as well as double crosses and secret missions.

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: Iron Bodyguard
programme.desc: Wang Wu, the head of a security firm Iron Bodyguard, meets a scholar who is a member of the Reformists, a group of scholars pressing for social reform in China at the end of the Qing dynasty. The Emperor actually supports such reforms but not the Empress Dowager. She orders the Reformists to be arrested and Wang Wu gets drawn into the politics.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: Roving Swordsman
programme.desc: An ambitious evil clan intends to rule the martial arts world. To achieve their goal, they must first steal a secret martial arts manuscript depicting how firearms can be produced. However, a supremely intelligent swordsman Shen Sheng Yi is protecting the manuscript and remains one step ahead of the evil clan.

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: A poor student, Lin, is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises Lin because of his familys declining status. Lin visits his fiance before he leaves for the imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lins bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: The Shaolin Avengers
programme.desc: Hu seeks to avenge his father who is being killed by the White-Browed Hermit and his gang. However, he fails in his attempt and is saved by Fang Shi Yu, a youth from Shaolin whose parents are also killed by the same villains. They learn and master the advanced Shaolin style kung fu, before Fang leads Hu and the Shaolin fellows to fight the enemies.

programme.title: Diary of a Lady-killer
programme.desc: Tycoon Zhou is a playboy who is engaged to be married, but that did not keep him from working his charms on as many ladies as he can. He keeps a diary about his romantic escapades and soon, the women with whom he has been intimate with are being murdered one by one. Zhou becomes the number one suspect by the police but is the killer someone else?

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: Kid From Kwangtung
programme.desc: After many years as a respected actor and action choreographer, the Shaw Studio finally gave the dependable and commendable Hsu Hsia a chance to direct his own movies. He didn't waste the opportunity, inviting three other kung-fu designers to help on this fight-filled thriller. Wang Yu, co-star of such classics as Dirty Ho and The Kid With A Tattoo, here takes center stage as a young rascal caught between an anti-Ching Confederation and violent, vengeful Ching troops. But when he discovers that the good guys are led by master martial arts actor Jen Shih-kuan and the bad guys are led by the incredible Huang Cheng-li everyone knows that loads of great kung-fu is in store.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperors death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: The Dragon Missile
programme.desc: Sima works for a corrupt lord Qin who is suffering from a deadly disease that only a special herb can cure. Qin sends him on an urgent mission to retrieve it, but the task is made more difficult when Sima has to fight off other martial artists who want to steal the cure away from him. He has to fight with his ultimate weapon, the Dragon Missile!

programme.title: The Female Prince
programme.desc: Hsiao's stepmother frames her fianc Lung when he refuses to forfeit their engagement and sends him to prison. To save him, Hsiao disguises as Lung to take the Imperial exam and ranks first place. Impressed by Hsiao, the Emperor weds the Princess to 'him'. When Hsiao comes clean on their wedding night, she persuades the Princess to follow a plan

programme.title: The Thundering Sword
programme.desc: Two disciples, Yu and Zheng, are sent by their master to track down the invincible weapon Thundering Sword to prevent villains from getting it. Yu encounters the daughter of a ruthless clan, Chiao, who is on her way to seek for the sword. They quickly fall for each other, but when Chiao accidentally injures Zheng, things become complicated.

programme.title: Tropicana Interlude
programme.desc: Ping and Su are lovers who operate a travel agency specializing in Southeast Asian holidays. Tung, a school mistress, and her students join a guided tour lead by Ping. During the trip, a spoiled kid Li is attracted to Ping but Su thinks Ping has fallen for Tung and leaves. How will Ping deal with the situation and ends up happily back with Su?

programme.title: Dragon Swamp
programme.desc: Fan is cheated by her lover Tong to steal her masters Jade Dragon Sword. She is jailed in the Dragon Swamp as punishment and gave birth to a pair of twins - her daughter is raised by her master, while her son is taken by Tong. Twenty years later, the sword is stolen again and Fans daughter goes seeking for it, meeting Fans friend along the way.

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wens brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wens home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: Judgement of an Assassin
programme.desc: An evil clan plans a discord so as to dominate the martial arts world. Their masked assassins massacre another clan and one of the assassins is arrested and brought to trial at a tribunal of all the clans. What judgement will they make and can they uncover the truth?

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charns beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dongs concubine as he knows Dongs adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: Return of the Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: One of Shaw Studios highest grossing movies ever, this is the story of Li Chin Huan, the renowned, charming and sentimental swordsman who must fight many opponents, including an evil Clan Chief, for a place in the martial arts world.

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the familys young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huos stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: The Singing Killer
programme.desc: Chiang Yi is blackmailed into a jewelry heist by his former boss, who threatens to expose his shady past. Complications arise when he discovers his first love works at the store.

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of women's rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: The Comedy of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sisters wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: The Fighting Fool
programme.desc: Famous Kung Fu Pole master Red Eagle, is kidnapped by a villain one day. His disciple Meng, vows to rescue him. On his way, Meng encounters a greedy but great martial artist who agrees to join him in the rescue. Even though the two have extremely different personalities, they manage to team up and fight the villain in a final showdown.

programme.title: Asia-pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: The Tigress Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Sam is being hunted as he discovers that the mayor and the chief of medical bureau are colluding with a drug dealer. He is saved by a fishermen family and works in their friends grocery but the grocery owner is killed when the enemies track Sam down. Sam escapes to Shaolin to learn the cudgel style of kung fu in order to avenge his friends.

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: Tales of a Eunuch
programme.desc: Tales Of A Eunuch reunites the potent mix of martial arts superstar Gordon Liu, who plays Emperor in cognito Kang Hsi, with the kung-fu comedienne Wang Yu, an anti-Ching revolutionary. It is a film laced with wild barrages of excellent martial arts chiefly choreographed by Yuen Hua and Yuan Pien; Jackie Chan's long-time kung-fu classmates. At one time, Wang was considered to be the next Alexander Fu Sheng.

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: Twin Blades Of Doom
programme.desc: A retired martial artist is forced to return with a vengeance after his family and friends are murdered by the evil Ghost Gang. He decides to challenge the gangs leader to a deadly duel so as to take revenge. Can he defeat the ruthless leader in the end?

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: In the Yuan Dynasty, martial artists everywhere battle for the Heaven Sword and the Dragon Sabre, as only when these two powerful weapons combine can a secret be revealed to help one become the king of the martial arts world. As Zhang Wu Ji acquires the skills from Nine Yang Scriptures by chance, he is also embroiled in this lengthy battle.

Each had scored a victory against the other during their heyday, but in 1983, on the eve of their decisive third match, Razor suddenly announced his retirement, refusing to explain why but effectively delivering a knock-out punch to both their careers. Thirty years later, boxing promoter Dante Slate Jr., seeing big dollar signs, makes them an offer they cant refuse: to re-enter the ring and settle the score once and for all.

In the follow-up to the record-breaking hit comedy, Phil (Bradley Cooper), Stu (Ed Helms), Alan (Zach Galifianakis) and Doug (Justin Bartha) travel to exotic Thailand for Stu's wedding. After Doug's now-unforgettable Las Vegas bachelor party, Stu is not taking any chances and has opted for a safe and subdued pre-wedding brunch. Things don't always go as planned however. What happens in Vegas may stay in Vegas, but what happens in Bangkok can't even be imagined think monkeys, tattoos and the return of Mr. Chow! Acclaimed comedy filmmaker Todd Phillips reunites with his comic quartet of over-indulged stars for another globe-trotting howl at the moon with the "Wolfpack."

programme.title: Eight Legged Freaks
programme.desc: What do you get when you cross toxic waste with a bunch of exotic spiders?.. Eaten!.. The residents of a rural mining town discover that an unfortunate chemical spill has caused hundreds of little spiders to mutate overnight to the size of SUVs. And their hungry! When the alarm is sounded, it's then up to mining engineer Chris McCormack and Sheriff Sam Parker to mobilize an eclectic group of townspeople, including the Sheriff's young son, Mike, her daughter, Ashley and paranoid radio announcer Harlan Griffith and Deputy Pete Willis into battle against the bloodthirsty eight-legged beasts.

programme.title: The Rite
programme.desc: "Choosing not to believe in the devil won't protect you from him." Academy Award winner Anthony Hopkins stars in this supernatural thriller that reveals the devil's reach to even one of the holiest places on earth. Inspired by true events chronicled by Rome-based journalist Matt Baglio, this exorcism drama follows a skeptical seminary student (Colin O'Donoghue) attending an exorcism school at the Vatican. While in Rome, he's sent to apprentice with an unorthodox priest (Hopkins) who introduces him to the darker side of his faith. Also starring I Am Legend's Alice Braga, Rome's Ciarn Hinds, Harry Potter's Toby Jones and Blade Runner's Rutger Hauer, this haunting chiller demonstrates how a disillusioned young priest ultimately finds his true faith by facing pure evil.

programme.desc: A budding romance between a British officer's daughter and an independent man who was reared as a Mohawk complicates things for the British officer, as the adopted Mohawk pursues his own agenda despite the wrath of different people.

programme.title: Crom
programme.desc: High school teenagers accidentally unleash an ancient Irish entity on their hometown and must stop it before midnight on Halloween

programme.title: Kaw
programme.desc: The raven has a body that is twenty inches long with a three foot wing span and razor sharp beak and talons.When these birds begin to attack humans in a small town, there is no where to hide.

programme.title: Identity
programme.desc: Ten strangers marooned at a desolate motel begin to die one by one.

programme.title: Pandorum
programme.desc: Two crew members wake up on an abandoned spacecraft with no idea who they are, how long they've been asleep, or what their mission is. Soon after, they discover they're not alone, and the situation is more horrifying than they ever could have imagined.

programme.title: In Isolation
programme.desc: Four friends wanted to get away from it all in a remote country house but when a mysterious injured man turns up on their doorstep telling tales of a city ravaged by a epidemic and the looters who have pursued him, the friends rally to help

programme.title: The Final Cut
programme.desc: Sometime in the future, everyone has an implant that records their every waking hour. Alan is a 'cutter' who edits this footage when a person dies. However, his latest film leaves his life at risk after he discovers a dark secret.

programme.title: Identity
programme.desc: Ten strangers marooned at a desolate motel begin to die one by one.

programme.title: Crom
programme.desc: High school teenagers accidentally unleash an ancient Irish entity on their hometown and must stop it before midnight on Halloween

programme.title: Curse Of Chucky
programme.desc: He's back! From the filmmakers that brought you Chucky comes the terrifying return of the pint-sized doll possessed by the spirit of a notorious serial killer.

programme.title: Supercharged Otters
programme.desc: Charlie Hamilton James has filmed otters for over 25 years and now, through a set of groundbreaking experiments and incredible wild encounters, Charlie wants to reveal why he believes they're so special.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Devastating floods trap residents in Australia, a base jumper gets stranded in freezing temperatures and a destructive hail storm batters Texas.

programme.title: Deadly Predators S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Predator Power - Steve goes in search of some of the most powerful predators on the planet. At historic Warwick Castle, we meet the stellar sea eagle, the world's heaviest eagle.

programme.title: Deadly Predators S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Super Senses - Steve goes in search of Deadly Predators with the greatest super-senses on earth. From echolocating bats to supersonic whales, and a snake that sees its prey in complete darkness.

programme.title: Snow Dogs: Into the Wild
programme.desc: Wildlife adventurer Gordon Buchanan uses a dog team to retrace the steps of famous arctic explorers and examine the ancient relationship between man and dog.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return To The Wild UK S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Wales - Ben Fogle returns to meet his previous contributors who set up home in remote locations. In this episode, he heads back to a remote part of Wales to see Emma, who lives in an incredibly unique home.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S6 Ep4
programme.desc: Denby (Mugs) - Gregg Wallace visits the Denby factory in Derbyshire, which has been making pottery since 1809.

programme.title: Deadly Predators S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Speed - Steve goes in search of the fastest Deadly Predators on earth. Using the latest CGI, Steve high-dives off a rugged cliff in Wales next to a gannet and tests the speed and accuracy of a gannet dive in a sky-high experiment in his deadly junkyard.

programme.title: Deadly Predators S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Wild and Weird - In this episode, Steve goes in search of the wildest Deadly Predators and takes a closer look at what makes them weird. He goes diving in Dorset to look for one of the sea's weirdest deadly fish - seahorses.

programme.title: South Korea with Alexander Armstrong S1 Ep3
programme.desc: In the final leg of his journey Alexander visits Busan, a coastal port and South Korea's second biggest city. He takes in a visit to a shaman, and climbs up Sunrise Peak, a UNESCO world heritage site.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Jungle Brawler - Guyana's jungle in South America is known for its wild and untamed territories. Cyril is on a dangerous quest upriver, going deep into the rainforest, beyond where gold diggers look for bounty.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls S4 Ep8
programme.desc: Derek Hough - Dancer and choreographer Derek Hough joins Bear on a whirlwind adventure across the mountains of Bulgaria.

programme.title: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades
programme.desc: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades - Marvel at the stunning conversion of a bleak waste-water dumping ground into a paradise for Europes birds. Travel to western Germany for an intimate look at this reclamation success story, and see the thriving animal communities that live there.

programme.title: Loons: A Cry from the Mist 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Race the clock with biologists as they try to figure out why North American loons are suddenly in danger. Unlock the mysterious lives of these beloved birds, and ponder whether their cries will continue to be summers soundtrack or go silent forever.

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: Osprey: Sea Raptor - Wade into a saltwater marsh along the Connecticut River to witness the heartwarming reunion of two ospreys whove been mates for a decade. Witness their highs and lows over a single summer as they raise their chicks and dodge a host of predators.

programme.title: Woodpeckers: The Hole Story
programme.desc: Woodpeckers: The Hole Story - March to the steady drumbeat of a unique avian family. Learn why the worlds 239 woodpecker species, from massive to minute, are natures best lumberjacks; explore their flying, climbing, and calling skills; and get a look inside their secret nests.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Weird, Wild & Wonderful - Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Canada - Canada, where summer is short and time is tight any time is the right time to fight. The mighty North provides the setting for bison, bald eagles, and polar bears to wage some of the most heavy-duty fighting in the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Belize - More than 200 caves play host to an unmatched array of marine life and coral formations in this underwater kingdom 40 kilometres from Belize City. It's a deep blue wilderness brimming with rare, exotic fish, eagle rays, sharks, and huge green morays.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Cozumel - Clear waters, deep reefs, dangerous caves, and tunnels draw divers to the island of Cozumel on Mexicos east coast. The Caribbean Sea port is home to multicoloured schools of fish, bull sharks, and gigantic sea turtles.

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: After the Wildfires - Examine fires pivotal role in shaping Australias natural world. Tour the devastation left by 2020s brutal bush-fire season, learn how climate change fuelled this watershed event, and chart the long-term recovery of the continents wildlife.

programme.title: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1 Ep7
programme.desc: The Hamadryas of Awash - Ethiopias Awash National Park is home to a closely knit group where aggression plays a vital role in ensuring strong family bonds and structure. Their daily challenges with each other and the contrasting environment of Awash give way to a fascinating society.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep7
programme.desc: South America - From the Amazon to the Andes, South America has some beautiful scenery. From guanacos sparring over grassland, to marine iguanas head-butting over a beachhead, to home-stealing hermit crabs, the quest for real estate causes a lot of conflict.

programme.title: After the Wildfires

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Southeast Asia - With real-life dueling dragons, giant sumo-wrestling beetles, street-fighting monkeys, and sea turtles that play king of the hill on top of another sea turtle, Southeast Asia boasts a wide range of wildlife warriors.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep9
programme.desc: USA - The USA is big on flash and spectacle. Bighorn rams rattle the mountaintops. Brown bears battle, desperate to fatten up for winter. Sharp-tailed grouse shake their tail-feathers on the dance floor. Wild stallions rumble with beauty and grace.

programme.title: Animals Decoded 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rumble in the Jungle - Tune into the natural world and explore frequencies beyond human hearing, like the gentle hum of giraffes in the evening, or creatures who use song to claim territory on a seemingly silent coral reef.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Berenty Dynasty - The pressure to find food reaches new heights and throws the reserve into turmoil. Witness fractures emerge within the ranks, dividing the gangs and leading Crystal, the indomitable leader of the Ruins gang, to face a challenge like none before.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Back with the Packs - Return to South Luangwa to see the new pups born to the mighty Manzi and the tiny-but-fearless Kakumbi packs. See yearling Snowy face a hungry hyena before a lion pride scatters Manzi mum Wekas pups and leaves her frantically searching for them.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Hunting with the Manzi - Run into a lion-hyena showdown with Julz as he hunts for the elusive Manzi pack, who are missing four of their precious pups. Then join Henry from the Zambian Carnivore Programme on a house call to the Kakumbi den, where another pup has gone AWOL.

programme.title: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades
programme.desc: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades - Marvel at the stunning conversion of a bleak waste-water dumping ground into a paradise for Europes birds. Travel to western Germany for an intimate look at this reclamation success story, and see the thriving animal communities that live there.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands with Eoin Warner 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sea of Serpents - Begin on Rathlin, where flightless guillemot chicks take a leap of faith and golden hares welcome the dawn. Head to Tory to see basking sharks, dolphins, and the endangered corncrakes dance of love. Then chase adorable Irish stoats across Achill.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands with Eoin Warner 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Edge of the Abyss - Continue the odyssey along Irelands west coast. Spy on the love affairs of grey seals in the Inishkea Islands and ply Connemaras turquoise waters. Wander in Clares magical woods and catch hundreds of basking sharks engaged in a mating display.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Battle for the Bay - Follow the Bay Familys matriarch as she chases the Nomads out of her territory for good, and examine the surprising birthing den where the Townies leader, Mia, settles in. Then kick back with the Mangrove Family as they pal around with stray dogs.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Queen of the Bay - Chase Anna to the Townies lair, where Mia and her newborn pups are hiding out. See the babies first swimming lessons before the clan moves to new digs, and welcome an era of otter peace as the Mangrove Family becomes a parks main attraction.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Back with the Packs - Return to South Luangwa to see the new pups born to the mighty Manzi and the tiny-but-fearless Kakumbi packs. See yearling Snowy face a hungry hyena before a lion pride scatters Manzi mum Wekas pups and leaves her frantically searching for them.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Hunting with the Manzi - Run into a lion-hyena showdown with Julz as he hunts for the elusive Manzi pack, who are missing four of their precious pups. Then join Henry from the Zambian Carnivore Programme on a house call to the Kakumbi den, where another pup has gone AWOL.

programme.title: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades
programme.desc: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades - Marvel at the stunning conversion of a bleak waste-water dumping ground into a paradise for Europes birds. Travel to western Germany for an intimate look at this reclamation success story, and see the thriving animal communities that live there.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Battle for the Bay - Follow the Bay Familys matriarch as she chases the Nomads out of her territory for good, and examine the surprising birthing den where the Townies leader, Mia, settles in. Then kick back with the Mangrove Family as they pal around with stray dogs.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Queen of the Bay - Chase Anna to the Townies lair, where Mia and her newborn pups are hiding out. See the babies first swimming lessons before the clan moves to new digs, and welcome an era of otter peace as the Mangrove Family becomes a parks main attraction.

programme.title: Animals Decoded 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rumble in the Jungle - Tune into the natural world and explore frequencies beyond human hearing, like the gentle hum of giraffes in the evening, or creatures who use song to claim territory on a seemingly silent coral reef.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep9
programme.desc: USA - The USA is big on flash and spectacle. Bighorn rams rattle the mountaintops. Brown bears battle, desperate to fatten up for winter. Sharp-tailed grouse shake their tail-feathers on the dance floor. Wild stallions rumble with beauty and grace.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands with Eoin Warner 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sea of Serpents - Begin on Rathlin, where flightless guillemot chicks take a leap of faith and golden hares welcome the dawn. Head to Tory to see basking sharks, dolphins, and the endangered corncrakes dance of love. Then chase adorable Irish stoats across Achill.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands with Eoin Warner 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Edge of the Abyss - Continue the odyssey along Irelands west coast. Spy on the love affairs of grey seals in the Inishkea Islands and ply Connemaras turquoise waters. Wander in Clares magical woods and catch hundreds of basking sharks engaged in a mating display.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep10
programme.desc: Europe - From the Highlands to the Alps, Europes evocative landscapes are the backdrop for epic wildlife drama. Normally stoic red deer go wild during the rut. Wolf packs clash over territory, and foxes do the foxtrot - its not as nice as it sounds.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep11
programme.desc: South Africa - Wildebeest battle for herd hierarchy, meerkats live the thug life, floppy fish fight it out on land and locusts give up their vegetarian ways in a frenzy of cannibalism. It all happens on the wild and wide-open landscape of South Africa.

programme.title: Animals Decoded 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Invisible Signals - Could undiscovered animal languages save some of our most endangered species? From subtle scents to colors that are invisible to the human eye, uncover the hidden ways creatures communicate, which scientists are only starting to understand.

programme.title: Coastal Africa 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sweeping Shores - The African intertidal zone is home to a unique universe of plants and creatures. Here, life has adapted to survive in a challenging marine environment - some species are able to live on exposed rocks, while others prefer the shelter of rock pools.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep3
programme.desc: The Missing Manzi - Join Julz and park scout Simon Chulu as they track the Kakuli pack, who they filmed last year, and a Manzi faction whove ditched a tracking collar and broken away from the group. Spot the Kakumbi making a kill before a happy Manzi reunion ensues.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Kakumbi Are Vulnerable - Encounter an elephant as Julz and Henry from the ZCP track the Kakumbi pups, who face off with a stubborn, razor-tusked warthog. Follow Thandie Mweetwa, ZCPs lion specialist, who counts the prides that are pushing the Manzi out of their territory.

programme.title: Loons: A Cry from the Mist 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Race the clock with biologists as they try to figure out why North American loons are suddenly in danger. Unlock the mysterious lives of these beloved birds, and ponder whether their cries will continue to be summers soundtrack or go silent forever.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Battle for the Bay - Follow the Bay Familys matriarch as she chases the Nomads out of her territory for good, and examine the surprising birthing den where the Townies leader, Mia, settles in. Then kick back with the Mangrove Family as they pal around with stray dogs.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Devon Island - Land of Ice - Devon Island is the largest uninhabited island in the world. Its so remote and forbidding that when scientists wanted to simulate living conditions on Mars, they chose Devon. Devons barren landscape only supports the hardiest of plants and few animals.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Delta Discoveries - The Western Arctics mammoth Mackenzie Delta is the second largest in North America after the Mississippi. Here we find strange and mysterious land forms above an immense underbelly of permafrost featuring a phenomenal diversity of microorganisms, and strange creatures that tell a story of an ever changing Arctic. This is the migratory destination - and summer home - to several million birds, fish, animals. .. and humans.

programme.desc: Coming Home To Old Hawaii Charm - A woman is returning to Hawaii after 40 years on the mainland. She enlists her sister to help find the perfect home with old Hawaii charm.

programme.title: Hawaii Life S12 Ep4
programme.desc: Leaving Idaho To Scuba Dive In Kona - A couple from Idaho fell in love with Hawaii while on a scuba diving trip. Theyre searching for a single-family home thats close to the ocean.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Cheating Death - Cathy thought she had found the man of her dreams in Peter Tobin. But by the time she discovered his dark secret, it was too late.

programme.title: Mountain Monsters S5 Ep8
programme.desc: The Den Of The Smoke Wolves - The hunt comes to a head when the AIMS team locates what may be the secret lair of the Smoke Wolves.

programme.title: Luxury Uncovered S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Ritz Carlton Hotel, Moscow, Russia - Jenny travels to Red Square in Moscow to see how one of the the most iconic hotel names in the world provide service and a great guest experience.

programme.title: Luxury Uncovered S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Oceana Beach Reserve - Jenny will start with a trip out with the rangers,tending to animals like rhino and springbok,looking after the watering holes and guiding guests as a ranger.

programme.title: Hawaii Life S12 Ep5
programme.desc: Dog Days On The Big Island - After travelling around the world, a couple have decided to settle down in Hawaii. Their wish list includes an open floor plan and a scenic view.

programme.title: Hawaii Life S12 Ep6
programme.desc: Making New Memories On The Big Island - A father is moving to Hawaii to spend more time outdoors with his family. He wants a three-bedroom home with an ocean view and a tropical garden.

programme.title: True Nightmares: Tales Of Terror S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Honor Thy Mother - Ed Gein's grief at the loss of his mother leads to frightening tales of murder. A random twist of fate raises questions about the death of a thrill-seeking teenager.

programme.title: True Nightmares: Tales Of Terror S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Battle Lines - A simple dispute between neighbors escalates into a deadly conflict with unlikely suspects.

programme.title: Michigan Hell House
programme.desc: Michigan Hell House - Paranormal investigator Steve Shippy and psychic medium Cindy Kaza use newly uncovered recordings to unlock the mystery of the Pomeraning family haunting.

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia Ep15
programme.desc: Mudslinging - Jim is nominated for Spring Fling King Meanwhile Strickler brings Angor Rot to Arcadia so the Troll assassin can meet his prey.

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia Ep16
programme.desc: Roaming Fees May Apply - Jims quest for Gunmars birthstone sends the gang deep into the heart of a volcano that is not what it seems and Strickler seeks to protect himself.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep15
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Frantic Fury of the Fearsome Furculees - Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep16
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Harmful Horrors of the Harrowing Hiveschool - After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep17
programme.desc: Cleopatra Needs Space - Akila and Brian are having major romance drama and Cleo HAS to get away from it. She gets captured by Space Scavengers, but its still kind of an improvement.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep18

programme.desc: Don't Worry Be Peppy / Two's A Cloud - When Poppy worries that her father doesnt feel useful now thats hes no longer King, she asks her friends to bring Peppy small problems to solve. programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep5
programme.desc: Rupert and the Cloud Shepherd - Rupert, Ping Pong, Bill and Ming help the Cloud Shepherd find some missing clouds that have sneaked away to play. But how can the friends get them back up into the sky?

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep6
programme.desc: Rupert and the Magic Carpet - When Ming gets stuck up a tree, Rupert, Ping Pong and Bill try to rescue her but, thanks to Edward's mistakes, they all get stuck too. Can Edward overcome his fear of heights and save them?

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep7
programme.desc: Rupert and the Cheeky Sneeze - When one of Rupert's sneezes escapes the friends have to find it a home in the forest.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep8
programme.desc: Rupert and the Special Sandcastle - Despite Miranda's warnings a sandcastle competition in Rocky Bay is in danger from the incoming tide

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep5
programme.desc: Who Did I Hear In The Big Hollow Log? - Jess is searching for Horace by the pond but he's nowhere to be found. When he calls into a hollow log and his voice echo's back, Jess thinks it's the voice of a new friend and sets about trying to work out where the friend is. By using comparisons and clever thinking, Jess works out that it's not someone else - it's his voice bouncing off the log. It's an echo,

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep6
programme.desc: What Can We Do With Mimi's Rubbish? - Jess is off to play painting and gluing with his pink rabbit friend Mimi. He's very excited. But when he arrives Mimi's hutch is overflowing with rubbish and there's no space for their art project. Jess works out how to get the rubbish out of the hutch using recyclling re-using and re-pairing.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep7
programme.desc: Who Wants To Live In Baa's Meadow? - Baa's feeling lonely as his buddy Billie the mouse has gone off for the day. Jess goes hunting for someone to come to the meadow to live with Baa. He find a fish to live in the trough, but there's no pond weed for him to live, he tries Sammy snail but he carries his own home on his back so he doesn't need a new home, finally they realise that there are ants already living with Baa in the meadow.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep8
programme.desc: Why Are The Ants Visiting Mimi? - Mimi's painting a lovely picture at her hutch, with Jess along for a visit. Suddenly she's collapses in fits of tickly giggles, there are ants everywhere.. Mimi can't paint, tho, whilst she's being tickled and Jess works out they are here for her honey sandwiches!

programme.title: Olivia Ep23
programme.desc: Olivia Acts Out - It's time for the annual school play, but Olivia's stuck playing the part of Cow #2, while Francine lands the starring role. It's up to Olivia to make the most of her small part: with a little help from Julian, she choreographs a climactic mooove for herself and has the crowd on their feet.

programme.title: Olivia Ep24
programme.desc: Olivia And The School Concert - The theme of this year's school concert is Fantastic Fruits and Vibrant Vegetables, and Olivia couldn't be more thrilled. But poor Julian can't bear the thought of singing his celery song in front of an audience. With a little imagination and some quick thinking, Olivia helps him overcome his stage fright.

programme.title: Olivia Ep25
programme.desc: Olivia And The Family Photo - Mother is determined to take the perfect family Christmas photo in the middle of the summer. With the help of a snow machine, Olivia takes it upon herself to bring a little Christmas spirit to the photograph, and to Francine's backyard beach party next door.

programme.title: Olivia Ep26
programme.desc: Olivia Goes Camping - Francine comes along reluctantly on Olivia's family camping trip, and Olivia can't believe that anyone could be so unprepared for life in the great outdoors. But with a little hiking, bug-catching, and marshmallow roasting, Olivia is sure she can transform Francine from a novice to an expert camper.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep5
programme.desc: Why Hen Pecks The Ground - You see there was a time when Hen didn't peck the ground. She was a proud mother who spent all her time looking after and cleaning her chicks. Fancy pancy Peacock upsets Mama Hen and makes her feel plain. All the animals are furious with Snooty Peacock but the damage has been done. Eagle Mama Hen's best friend decides to lend Hen her most prized possession A needle! And Mama Hen sews herself the most beautiful coat of new feathers. Everyone is delighted and they dance and dance and dance. But Mama Hen forgets all about the needle and it gets lost in all the dust. Eagle's precious needle! From that day on Hen always pecks the ground looking for the needle to return to her friend. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep6
programme.desc: Why Bat Hangs Upside Down - You see there was a time when Bat didn't hang upside down. He used to fly all over Tinga Tinga, saying Boo!' to all the animals and giving them a fright. Nothing could be more fun for Bat. But one day Bat went too far and the animals decided to give Bat a dose of his own medicine. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep7
programme.desc: Why Warthog Is Ugly - You see there was a time when Warthog was really rather handsome. And did he know it! He strutted around Tinga Tinga as if he owned the place. All the animals were fed up with Warthog's boasting, and then one day Lion decided to give chase. Yikes! Warthog ran headfirst into Porcupines burrow! After that, he was no longer the prettiest beast in Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep8
programme.desc: Why Owls Head Turns All The Way Round - You see there was a time when Owl's head didn't turn all the way round. She had tiny little eyes and tiny little ears, and she found it very hard to stay awake. Then one day all the Mangoes started disappearing in Tinga Tinga. Against all the animals better judgement, Owl was ordered to watch over the Mango tree but the mangoes kept disappearing. Desperate to catch the thief, Owl stretched and strained to see who was stealing the precious mangoes, until Ker-Swhing! Her head turned all the way round and she saw who it was It was the ants! From that day on Owl was made the official night guard of Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep4
programme.desc: Formula for Menace: A Dekker Moonboots Mystery - When Baby Corp babies start aging, panic hits the office and the babies set out to find out if someone has been tainting the formula

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep5
programme.desc: Monster Machine - The annual baby pageant approaches, but Stacis plan to win may have a negative effect

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep10
programme.desc: The Knight's Fall Part 1 - Po and Blade rush to warn the Emperor about the weasels, but he has Po arrested and Colin captures Blade, revealing that she was never a knight. Thrown in a cell, Po reunites with Rukhmini and Mr. Ping, and he copes with the truth about Blade as they break out. Po fights Klaus and Veruca but is outmatched. Blade defeats Colin and hurries to help Po but is too late.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep8
programme.desc: Eye'll Be Watching You / Sorry Not Sorry - Convinced Troll Village is dangerous Branch makes a security plantPoppy creates an apology monster out of Gristle when teaching him how to make amends.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep73
programme.desc: Like A Fox - Puss gets jealous when Guy Fox shows up and asks Dulcinea to run off with him

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep22
programme.desc: Baby Face Off / The Pursuit Of Wrinkliness - Thunk babysits Sandy and new baby Cliff to prove his responsible. Cliff is a jerk and keeps getting Sandy in trouble/Gran worries that Thunk isn't tough enough to survive to adulthood because he likes to hang out with old people, so she puts him through a series of toughness tests.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep8
programme.desc: Costa Rica... IN COLOR! - When Wizard Whitebeard receives a postcard from Costa Rica, Wenda -- a bird-lover with an encyclopedic knowledge of rare birds -- notices that the birds in the postcard have lost their color! Wally and Wenda head to the Costa Rican rain forest to investigate alongside Wizard Featherbeard.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep26
programme.desc: Snow Dog, Snow! - When Tag and Scooch learn that Sandra Paws' sleigh broke down on a mountain, they have to go on an adventure to fix the sleigh and save Sniffs-mas! Meanwhile, Beans tries to get a grumpy Frank to feel the Sniffs-mas spirit.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep21
programme.desc: The Great Paper Chase / Home Is Where Ken's Heart Is - When Rodney draws and writes his own comic book, TZG secretly helps him transport it to the comic book store where creator Ken KaBlam is on the hunt for new talent. / When Ken KaBlam gets homesick for his own hometown of Crostonburg, TZG secretly recreates the things me misses in Harmony Harbor.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep15
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Bouncing Bulb - Pat's Special Delivery is a very large, very fragile lighthouse bulb, and everything seems to be conspiring to make him break it! Falling timber, an out of control sofa, Bonnie the dog, high winds...! Pat's journey from the sorting office to Pencaster Bay is a minefield of hazards. Waiting for the bulb is lighthouse keeper Chris Beacon and his pet parrot Micawber, both anxious to get the lighthouse working before sundown, and tracking a storm blowing in. Out at sea are Alf and PC Selby, enjoying a day's fishing, until they drift off-course and need the lighthouse to guide them ashore...

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep16
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Lost Pigeon - The Thompson's family pigeon, Cedric, has been reported found in Northern Ireland. Pat must take Dorothy and Bill to help bring him back in the SDS Plane. Meanwhile Alf camps out at the sorting office, pining for his beloved Cedric's return. Once in Ireland, Pat meets the man who found Cedric and Dorothy manages to charm him down from his roof. Unfortunately an inopportune phone call from Alf startles cedric and causes him to take up a roost on a cliff face with a friendly puffin. With Alf causing chaos trying "help" Ben tidy up the Sorting office in Pencaster, Pat exercises his climbing skills to retrieve Cedric but it takes a brave abseil from Dorothy and Sean to finally lure the wayward bird back to its rightful owners.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep21
programme.desc: Hot, Hot, Hot - Aggro is embarrassed about big changes she's going through. And when she gets stuck in a volcano, the Rescue Riders seek help from ... Magnus?

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Ep21
programme.desc: Deja Flu / Crackridge Live - It's Archibald to the rescue when Loy, Sage and Finly come down with a bad case of the Dj Flu. Archibald and Cousin Ashley take over the airwaves.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep21
programme.desc: Monkey Planet - King Julien declares that lemurs will land on the moon and seeks help from a former astronaut: Stanislav, the Russian Space Monkey.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep40
programme.desc: Lucky and the Railroad Ransom - When Butch LePray hold Jim for ransom, Lucky and Spirit team up with the unlikeliest of allies to get her father back

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep34
programme.desc: Planet of the Capes / Whole Lotta Like - When Fredo publicly mocks a movie, Lotta challenges him to make his own. Lotta catches her pet bunny "in like" with her kitty nemesis.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep34
programme.desc: Deuce Is Wild/To Fire A Squire - Whiplash tries to scare Deuce and Edvard straight, but the plan backfires; After Turbo saves his life, Buster Move waits on Turbo's every need.
