programme.desc: The Great Paper Chase / Home Is Where Ken's Heart Is - When Rodney draws and writes his own comic book, TZG secretly helps him transport it to the comic book store where creator Ken KaBlam is on the hunt for new talent. / When Ken KaBlam gets homesick for his own hometown of Crostonburg, TZG secretly recreates the things me misses in Harmony Harbor.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep29
programme.desc: The Night Pig / Twigula - Kensington is terrorized by her overactive imagination when a possum comes into the yard and tangles with the Mighty Ones. / Berry mistakenly thinks that Twig is a juice sucker (like vampires for berries) and tries to convince him to make her into one too.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep42
programme.desc: Fluteus Maximus - When Puss approaches the third witch sister Maliflua, he discovers she is actually the Piper and that a fourth witch is much closer than ever imagined

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep20
programme.desc: El Apasionado Negocio de la Niera - Frederic makes a play to take over the town's babysitters by instituting "senior sitting"

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep21
programme.desc: Plushythingy - When Frederic Estes creates the cutest plushy ever that is the hottest toy in town, the field team must destroy the last remaining one but are powerless against its cuteness

programme.title: Captain Underpants Special 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Heartbreaking Havoc of the Haunting Hackaween Special - When Melvin and Krupp conspire to cancel Halloween, George and Harold need to remind their parents why Halloween was fun in the first place. But Melvin catches wind of their plan and uses his Inanimaniatator 2000 to turn the kids haunted house into real horrors! After summoning Captain Underpants to fight the monsters off, the boys find that Krupp and Melvin have gone one step further. Halloween isn't just cancelled - it's now ILLEGAL! George and Harold team up with their friends and hack their favorite holiday, creating Hack-a-ween! Theyll wear disguises instead of costumes, carve cabbages instead of pumpkins, and get snacks instead of candy. The new holiday is a hit! But when Melvin fights back, George and Harold realize that in order to beat him, they may ultimately have to make peace with him.

programme.title: Scared Shrekless Ep1
programme.desc: Scared Shrekless - Shrek gets in the Halloween spirit by challenging his fairytale friends to come up with scary stories for a contest. But the gang learn that they'll have to spend the night in Lord Farquaad's haunted castle before the winner is named.

programme.title: The Pig Who Cried Werewolf Ep1
programme.desc: The Pig Who Cried Werewolf - The Three Pigs live in a house together, but Heimlich gets scared when he sees Wolf move in next door and acting strange.

programme.title: Night Of The Living Carrots Ep1
programme.desc: Night Of The Living Carrots - On Halloween, a mutant alien pumpkin explodes in a carrot garden and zombie carrots rise up, bite the townspeople, and take over their minds. B.O.B., Dr. Cockroach and The Missing Link join forces to take on the zombie carrots.

programme.title: The Ghost Of Lord Farquaad Ep1
programme.desc: The Ghost Of Lord Farquaad - Shrek, Fiona, and Donkey are on their way to the hotel whereShrekand Fiona will spend their honeymoon when they encounterLord Farquaad's ghost!

programme.title: Far Far Away Idol Ep1
programme.desc: Far Far Away Idol - Watch your favorite Shrek characters sing the night away in this hilarious spoof. Join in the fun as Fiona, Puss in Boots, Donkey and the rest of the Far Far Away Kingdom battle it out in a singer's showdown.

programme.title: Monsters Vs Aliens: Mutant Pumpkins From Outer Space Ep1
programme.desc: Monsters Vs Aliens: Mutant Pumpkins From Outer Space - Susan Murphy (a.k.a. Ginormica) and the Monsters are now working with the US government as special ops. So when an alien presence is detected in Susan's hometown of Modesto, California -- right before Halloween -- the team is dispatched to investigate. Everything appears normal, right down to the jack-o-lanterns peering out from every doorstep and windowsill. But when Halloween arrives, those innocent-looking carved pumpkins reveal themselves for what they really are mutant aliens. The altered pumpkins then start to implement their fiendish plan to take over Earth. The Monsters are there to combat the mutant gourds and try to smash their wicked scheme!

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Costly Conundrum of the Calamitous Claylossus - George and Harold transform the school's mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.desc: Out of the Cave and Onto Thin Ice - After a shocking revelation, Po is determined to get his chi back and Jing decides to face Jindiao

programme.desc: Rupert Flies to Cheddar Moon - When Ping Pong uses her magic to turn Rupert's pedal car into a spaceship they fly to the moon. There they meet the Man on the Moon who runs a cheese stall.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep12
programme.desc: Rupert and the Giant Egg Race - It's the day of the Nutwood Egg and Spoon race but Raggety has magically turned Ping Pong into a giant egg. How can Ruprt and the friends have their race now?

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep9
programme.desc: Why Do Spiders Build Webs? - The friends are having a tidying up day. Frightened Baa doesn't like spiders or their webs but Jess helps him to stop being scared by working out that Spiders build webs to catch their supper, and Baa feels re-assured and happy. Spiders are rather nice, rather clean and rather clever.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep10
programme.desc: How Can We Bring The Outside Inside? - Poor Willow has a sore hoof and has to stay inside until it's better. She's really missing her orchard so Jess and Mimi are determined to bring something of the outside to Willow to cheer her up. A tree is too big and it's too late in the year for apples. Jess works out that they can make beautiful tree and leaf rubbings into a wonderful tree collage for the stable to remind Willow of her orchard.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep11
programme.desc: What's My Favourite Thing About Spring? - Mimi has promised Jess a special surprise if he can work out what he likes best about the Spring He finds out that there's blossom on the trees, fresh new grass, bright young flowers in the Springtime. But he decides his very favorite thing is the newly hatched very cute little baby birds which his friend Little Bird has been singing about all along.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest - With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep907
programme.desc: Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art - Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy. // When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep908
programme.desc: Pups Save the Hatchlings - When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep252
programme.desc: Stars - It is night time and the sky is full of stars. Mummy and Daddy Pig let Peppa and George put their coats on and they go outside to look at the stars. The stars look very tiny, but when Peppa and George look through a telescope the stars look bigger.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Work and Play - When Peppa and Suzy learn that grown ups must work all day, they decide to play at working in a store. But they quickly get tired of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep302
programme.desc: The Rainbow - Peppa and her family spot a rainbow when they go for a drive.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Bubble Trouble - Bubu's bubble maker invention works so well, it creates an enormous bubble that Christopher gets trapped in! He loves his journey soaring over the land - but his friends are desperate to rescue him!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Party Time - Anna and Froga want to throw a party..... since it is not a particular party day they decide to celebrate "Tomato Day", But Christopher ate all of the tomatoes ... so they need to find another name... Anna finds the perfect name: Friendship party!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep408
programme.desc: A Tale of Shovel & Pail - Siblings Shovel and Pail can't agree on an ending for their storybook! When they get so upset that they stop talking to each other, it's up to Josh, Blue and YOU to figure out a way to get them to resolve the conflict.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep926
programme.desc: Charger Visits the Pups / Pups Save a Shiny Ride - Rubble's cousin, Charger, visits Adventure Bay just in time to help out when a Humdinger-caused geyser destroys Mr. Porter's cafe. // Mayor Humdinger hatches a plan to sabotage a "Shinest Ride Contest", so it's up to the Paw Patrol to save the day.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep524
programme.desc: Pups Save a Mascot - Daring Danny X, dressed as a "Bird X" mascot for the Adventure Bay, gets carried away by a couple of eagles who mistake him for one of their own!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Beaver Home / The Crew Fixes A Road - The power is out in Builder Cove! When the pups find out a beaver is to blame, they've got to build him a new home to bring the power back. // When Speed Meister damages the road ahead of the town helper parade, the pups work fast to repave the way.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Jump up & get down / What's up Lola - It's Deer Squad to the rescue when Stu and Safia bounce off to space on their super bouncy mega trampolines./ A bad mood crystal causes Lola and many animals to become unusually grumpy!Jade has to help Deer Squad to restore joy around Central Forest.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep401
programme.desc: The Legend of the Jack O'Lantern - Happy Halloween! Count Josh-ula and Blue the Bat skidoo to the farm for a day of scarily fun festivities, and we play Blue's Clues to figure out how to make the legendary Jack O'Lantern emerge from the pumpkin patch!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Spooky Costume Party with Blue - It's a spooky Halloween at the Blue's Clues house - Blue's dressed up as a fish, but Magenta can't decide what to wear! We play Blue's Clues to figure out what costume Magenta should wear.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Night of the Witches - When Bonnie Bones steals a witch's broom, the crew must get it back before the festive Night of the Witches is ruined.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Mysterious Island / Mystery of the Vam-Pirates - On Halloween night, Santiago and his crew must retrieve the legendary Treasure Treats from La Isla Misteriosa. // Santiago encounters a real-life vampire! The two must team up to rescue their crews.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Werewolves of Bubbledon! - On Halloween eve in the foggy town of Bubbledon, everyone is nervous because there's a werewolf on the loose! Monster Detectives Molly, Gil and Dr. Pupson are on the case, but will they find the critter before Halloween is cancelled?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Truck or Treat - Its Halloween in Axle City, and Blaze, AJ, and all of their friends are excited to Truck or Treat. But when Crusher tries to steal all of their candy, his plan goes awry, and he sends their treats far away from Axle City.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Pups and the Ghost Pirate - Its Halloween! Captn Turbot has decorated an old wreck as a pirate ship for a town party. When the ship mysteriously heads out to sea captained by a "ghost" Ryder and the Paw Patrol must save the ship and discover the ghost!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep623
programme.desc: Pups Save the Phantom of the Frog Pond - A spooky sound forces frogs from their home. The pups must bring them home and solve the mystery of the frog pond phantom.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Baby Shark's Haunted Halloween - Baby Shark must overcome his one big fear when he meets a real life ghostfish!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Paddington And Halloween - It's Halloween and Paddington goes Treat or Treating with Jonathan and Judy around Windsor gardens but Mr. Curry does not want to join in...or does he?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Pedro's Cough - Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Doctor Brown Bear gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Windy Autumn Day - It is a cold and windy day. At the park, all the leaves have turned red and yellow. It is so windy that Peppas ball blows into the pond and Georges hat blows into a tree.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep304
programme.desc: The Library - Daddy Pig has a book from the library that he has kept for too long. The family go to the library to return it and find more books to read.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep305
programme.desc: The Camper Van - Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep306
programme.desc: The Camping Holiday - Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Compost - Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Barbazoo Can't Say ''No'' / The Doppelganger - Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep713
programme.desc: Arcade Adventure - Blaze, AJ, and Sparkle are at the arcade-and Sparkle's got her eye on an amazing glitter rocket! But, when she doesn't have enough tickets for the rocket, the friends must jump inside different video games and win enough tickets to collect the prize!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep612
programme.desc: Big Rig: Dolphin Delivery - When a dolphin named Flippy needs help getting back to his family in the ocean, there's only one monster machine with enough power to get the job done: Big Rig Blaze!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep923
programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Feathery Friends / Pups Save a Puffy Mayor - The Paw Patrol must rescue Mr. Porter and reunite an ostrich family before the big birds get into big trouble. // During Mayor Goodway's fashion show, the Pups must save Farmer Al and Mayor Humdinger after a puffy shirt floats away with them.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep924
programme.desc: Pups Save a Jukebox / Pups Save a Mayor on a Wire - Mayor Humdinger steals a jukebox so he can play an annoying song all day long. Chase and Rubble track it down to save the records. // A hungry eagle causes Mayor Goodway's tightrope walking lesson to go awry sending her careening down Jake's Mountain

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Shadowland / Medievel Tides - Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park. // When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.desc: The Legend of the Jack O'Lantern - Happy Halloween! Count Josh-ula and Blue the Bat skidoo to the farm for a day of scarily fun festivities, and we play Blue's Clues to figure out how to make the legendary Jack O'Lantern emerge from the pumpkin patch!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep304
programme.desc: The Ghost of the Living Room - Josh and Blue are throwing a Halloween party and all our friends are in costume! Blue's a unicorn, Magenta's a mouse, but who's that mysterious, silly ghost in the Living Room? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Baby Shark's Haunted Halloween - Baby Shark must overcome his one big fear when he meets a real life ghostfish!

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Wolf of Halloween - For Halloween, the Barbababies play wolf and have fun scaring each other.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep225
programme.desc: Paddington and the Halloween Mystery / Paddington's Campfire Stories - It's Halloween and there are strange goings on in Windsor Gardens - will Paddington solve the spooky mystery? // Whose story will earn them a camp fire story telling badge and will any of them be too scary!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep625
programme.desc: The Great Halloween Race - It's Halloween in Axle City, and Blaze, AJ, and all their friends are racing in The Great Halloween Race! First one across the finish line wins the biggest, tastiest goody bag ever!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep614
programme.desc: Pups Save a Bat Family / Pups Save a Mud Monster - A rockslide traps a Bat Family inside their cave, so the Pups have to free them! The bats search for a new home leads to problems in town though! // Snowboarders on Jake's Mountain are stuck on a broken chair lift while a monster is on the loose!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep319
programme.desc: Pups Get Growing - Fertilizer causes Yumis crops to sprout huge veggies, so Ryder and the Paw Patrol must corral the stampeding produce!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep925
programme.desc: Pups Save the Baby Space Rocks / Pups Save the Eddies and Emmys - When a mysterious storm drops hailstones that hatch into Baby Space Rocks, the Pups must find a way to keep them safe. // A 3-D printer leads to trouble when Eddie and Emmy make 3-D reproductions of themselves and play pranks all over Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest - When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Skate Park / The Crew Builds A Tunnel - The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Delphine Donkey - Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Fire Engine - When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Princess Peppa - Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Fun Run - Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Washing - Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Polly's Boat Trip - Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep306
programme.desc: Paddington and the Solar Eclipse/Paddington and the Mysterious Inventor - Paddington has a race against time in order to enjoy his first ever solar eclipse. // Paddington accepts an inventor's award for Simi when she's too shy to step up, but why does she then feel jealous and sad?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep409
programme.desc: Rainbow Puppy's Big Farm Fair - Welcome to the Great Farm Fair! There's food, games and even a Piggie talent show! When Rainbow Puppy's piglet Twinkle goes missing at the fair, Josh plays Blue's Clues to find Twinkle and keep her and Rainbow Puppy's blue-ribbon dreams alive.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep912
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost - When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. // Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and learns that it's not easy to help a ghost make new friends.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep110
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Pig Barn / The Crew Builds A Giant Runway - A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? // Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed when the pups realize Builder Cove's airport needs a bigger runway.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Sky Art / The Great Race - Sir Steel is upset with Lola's sky art as it affects the popularity of his hat stand, so he tries to disperse her artwork. // The Deer Squad have a race to see whose cart is the fastest, but Sir Steel unexpectedly join in with his Steelmobile!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Paddington and the Fundraising Day / Paddington's Alien Adventure - The town hall is leaking and needs a new roof, and Paddington must stay silent to raise the money. // Will the strange radio messages Jonathan is receiving mean visitors are arriving from another world? Paddington forms a greeting committee!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Potato Stew - Tiny Chef cooks pirate potato stew and uses a treasure map to find the special ingredient

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep623
programme.desc: Pups Rescue a Rescuer / Pups Save the Phantom of the Frog Pond - Mayor Goodway tries to help the PAW Patrol rescue Danny, but the pups end up having to rescue the rescuer, too! // A spooky sound forces frogs from their home. The pups must bring them home and solve the mystery of the frog pond phantom

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep626
programme.desc: Pups Save a Tour Bus / Pups Save Midnight at the Museum - Mayor Humdinger's tour bus goes out of control when he tries to bring tourists to Foggy Bottom! PAW Patrol to the rescue! // A fun museum sleepover is interrupted when Alex and the mini-patrol go missing, and Mayor Goodway gets stranded on a T-Rex!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep111
programme.desc: New New Year / Finders Keepers / Busy Buddies - Bossy is worried his family does not celebrate the Korean New Year "the right way. // Bossy finds a cool toy but doesn't want to give it up. // Bossy and Turtle overtask themselves when they take on all class jobs at once.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Shark House Rock / Toothpaste Tumble - Baby Shark helps Mommy find the perfect musical instrument to play in their family band. // Daddy is embarrassed after Grandpa and Baby post a funny video of him on ChewTube.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Space Invader / Reindeer's Game / Short Kites - After a long day of adventures together, Turtle needs space from Bossy. // Bossy and Turtle get distracted by a video game and lost Roller's backpack. // Bossy and Turtle want to fly a kite but Bossy's room must be clean first.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Jelly Juggernaut - Bossy and Turtle figure out how to share a card.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep114
programme.desc: One Bear Show - Bossy tries to do his own play.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Ultra Shell and Wonder Bear - Bossy helps Turtle's Biggest Dream Come True: being a superhero!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep218
programme.desc: The Lost Treasure of Merlandia - When Anani learns of a treasure chest filled with magic pearls, she enlists the help of the Pirate Protectors to find it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Rongisit - Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Mysteries - The family is watching Detective Potato on TV. Peppa and George want to be detectives too. So,Daddy Pig gives them a mystery to solve. Teddy is hidden and Peppa and George use a magnifying glass to follow a trail of cake crumbs to solve the mystery

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Talent Day - It is Talent Day at Peppa's daycare. Madame Gazelle wants everyone to show the class their special talent.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep321
programme.desc: Trip to the Moon - Peppa's family go to the museum's moon exhibition with George's friend Edmond Elephant. But Peppa thinks there are going to the real moon and is worried.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep322
programme.desc: Grandpa at the Playground - Grandpa Pig takes Peppa and George to the playground, but does not understand the children's rules.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep323
programme.desc: Goldie the Fish - Goldie the fish does not look happy and is not eating her food, so Peppa, George and Mummy Pig take her on a bus trip to visit Dr Hamster the vet.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Barbapapa Tree / The Barbababies' birthday - Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep613
programme.desc: Race to the Golden Gift - Blaze is joined by all of his friends in the Race to the Golden Gift! But to win, they'll first have to get past Crusher and his fresh batch of cheats.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep614
programme.desc: The Tiger Treasure - Blaze, AJ, and Stripes put their explorer skills to the test as they follow the trail to the fabled Tiger Treasure

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest - With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep907
programme.desc: Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art - Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy. // When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Daddy Shack / Rocky-Bye - After a selfish fish takes over the putt-putt, Baby Shark and William must find a champion mini-golf player to defeat him. // Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Baby Mayor - The fate of the city's squidapple supply lies in Baby's fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Paddington's First Chinese New Year / Paddington and the Missing Tickets - Ms. Potts is missing home, so Paddington decides to hold a surprise Chinese New Year Party. // Mr. Brown is taking the kids to the Circus tonight but where are the tickets? Paddington and the kids must retrace his steps to find them.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Paddington and the Summer Games / Paddington Goes Camping - The Browns are having their annual summer games. Will Paddington be good at any of them? // Mrs. Brown has bought an old camper van and decides to take the family on a camping holiday.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep410
programme.desc: Pearl's Kickball Championship - It's the Neighborhood Kickball Championship! Pearl, the neighborhood's best kicker, has albinism and nystagmus, and so the teams use a Beep Kickball to play. When the ball deflates, Josh plays Blue's Clues to figure out how to save the kickball game!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Bridge - Rubble and his construction pup family gear up to build a bridge, only to find the villainous Speed Meister has a different idea. It's up to Rubble & Crew to work together and save the day by building a new, safe bridge to Builder Cove.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep205
programme.desc: The wig of power / The duck who parped wolf - Steel Tower is under new management not once but twice - can the Deer Squad return it to a distraught Sir Steel? // Steel and Lady Fluffpot are putting up a play. Ian's false alarms frustrate Kai, but one of them turns out to be a REAL emergency!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep221
programme.desc: Mother's Day on the High Seas / Bonnie's Bones - It's the Annual Mother's Day Race and Santi is competing with Mami, but Enrique plans to cheat his way to victory. // Bonnie must steal an epic treasure to receive a family heirloom, but she keeps getting thwarted by the Pirate Protectors!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Call Me Billiam / The Finship Trap - When Rayna asks William to be more responsible, he sets out to become a grownup fishy named Billiam. // When Baby discovers Hank and Goldie aren't speaking to each other, he concocts an elaborate plan to bring them back together.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep111
programme.desc: New New Year / Finders Keepers / Busy Buddies - Bossy is worried his family does not celebrate the Korean New Year "the right way. // Bossy finds a cool toy but doesn't want to give it up. // Bossy and Turtle overtask themselves when they take on all class jobs at once.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep908
programme.desc: Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand - When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch. // Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humdinger Doll - With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure - Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! // When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Whistling - Peppa tries to learn how to whistle after she realizes that seemingly everyone but her can do it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Teddy's Playgroup - Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Danny's Pirate Party - It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Mr Potato Comes to Town - All the people in Peppa's town are excited to meet Mr Potato when he comes to open a new sports center.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep130
programme.desc: Anna's Horse - Anna joins her friends to a game of riddle. Not only can she not "neigh" like a horse, she can't even make a loud sound. Bubu helps Anna with a Horse toy that makes the perfect "neigh" sound- perfect plan until they lose control of the toy!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep43
programme.desc: The Big Parade Badge - Duggee and the squirrels help out when the leader of the Big Parade hurts his leg.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep44
programme.desc: The Be Careful Badge - When Naughty Monkey starts throwing bananas down from his branch, Ethel slips and the squirrels investigate.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep45
programme.desc: The First Aid Badge - The squirrels are playing Copy the King when Tag falls over and bumps his knee. Luckily, Duggee has his First Aid badge, so he can bandage Tag up.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep46
programme.desc: Korowai Treehouses, Indonesia - The Go Jetters are visiting the Korowai tribe in the rainforest of Papua in Indonesia. The Korowai take them into the forest where they have built a tree house.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep47
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Volcanic Island - Grandmaster Glitch is drilling near an underwater volcano in the ocean beside Academy Island in search of some hot bubbly mud.

programme.title: Kit and Pup S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Over and Under - Kit and Pup are out and about. Can you see who is going over the bridge and who is going under the bridge? Kit and Pup are also helping the little investigators pass toys over and under to get from one side of the room to the other.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Dog - Dee encourages a friend to say dog and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep82
programme.desc: Stuck - All of the Teletubbies are stuck. Tinky Winky's hand is stuck in the bag, Dipsy's hat is stuck, Laa-Laa's ball is stuck and Po is stuck on the Tubby Slidey!

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Best Friend Song - Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing the Best Friend Song with their school friends.

programme.title: Clangers S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Baby Skymoo - The Skymoos are building a special nest on the Clangers' planet. Who can it be for?

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep26
programme.desc: The Friendship Parade - Plom, Phoebe, Mae-Mae, Hooper, Zip, and Fly are a group of unique paper friends who live in Pop Paper City. They find new ways to have fun, such as playing pirates, building theme parks and even exploring outer space.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep62
programme.desc: Get On Track - Mayor Sho-Po would like the team to build a shortcut through the Po Forest... without taking away any trees!

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Float or Sink - Captain Messy plays pirates with his toys in a bowl of water, but why does his rubber duck float instead of sink?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Bouncing Batwaves - Messy is having fun blowing loud notes through his musical horn instrument, but whatever noise Messy is making, someone or something is making it too. Messy goes in search of the copycat voice.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Cavity Cave - Messy brushes his teeth, but why must we use toothpaste and a toothbrush to get teeth clean? He goes to OKIDO to find out.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep9
programme.desc: A Rainy Sunny Day - It's a grey and rainy day in the real world and Messy can see something amazing outside his window. A beautiful arch of colours magically appears across the sky. He goes to OKIDO to find out more.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep68
programme.desc: Pretend Piggy - Monty is told off when he behaves like a pig, literally, and decides to roll in the mud. This makes him think about why people can't act like animals.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep25
programme.desc: Donkey Jump - Sarah & Duck try to help Donkey get his jumping confidence back by building a surprise for him in their back garden.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep26
programme.desc: Rainbow Race - The changeable weather means Rainbow has to leave before finishing his story. Sarah & Duck try to find out how the story ends.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S16 Ep6
programme.desc: Flash Bang Wallop - A photographer is to take pictures of the engines for a book and Thomas is determined to get in more photographs than Gordon.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S16 Ep7
programme.desc: The Rubbish Train - Thomas has to help Whiff take a train of rubbish to the waste dump, but wants to stay clean so that he can take the Duchess of Boxford to have tea with Lady Hatt.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Yoga Ball - Bingo loves playing with Dad, but sometimes he forgets Bingo is smaller than her sister. Mum teaches Bingo how to use her big girl bark to keep the fun within her limits.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep32
programme.desc: Tin Can Games - It's the Tin Can Games and Evil Pea wants to win the Tin Can Trophy. She cheats in the final race by putting a magnet on Supertato's back to stop him from going super fast.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep46
programme.desc: The Bubble Badge - The dog blows a lot of bubbles with his pot of bubble mixture. Though it is quite hard to do, most of the squirrels eventually get the hang of it and the clubhouse fills up with lots of bubbles.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep47
programme.desc: The Submarine Badge - The dog and the squirrels go off on an underwater adventure with Betty's dad in his submarine, spotting creatures including a giant sea stallion and some jazz fish.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep48
programme.desc: The Detective Badge - A freshly baked apple pie is swiped from Duggee's windowsill, so he dons his detective badge to track down the thief.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep48
programme.desc: Chocolate Hills, Philippines - Greedy Grandmaster Glitch has been gorging on chocolate and wants more! The Grimbots discover a place called the Chocolate Hills on Bohol Island in the Philippines and take him there.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep49
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Global Gameshow - It's the Go Jetters as you've never seen them before as they take part in a disco dazzling around the world gameshow!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep50
programme.desc: Horsetail Fall, California - The Go Jetters have travelled to Horsetail Fall in the Yosemite National Park to watch the 300m high waterfall become Firefall.

programme.title: My World Kitchen S4 Ep7
programme.desc: Aleisha's Ugandan Rolex - Aleisha is making rolex, a Ugandan omelette-style recipe with fresh vegetables.

programme.desc: Andy and the Blue Whale - Andy blasts off in his safari sub to the Atlantic Ocean in search of a blue whale.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC275TeixeiravsProchazka
programme.desc: Whose titles were on the line at UFC 275 as Glover Teixeira faced Jiri Prochazka and Valentina Shevchenko took on Taila Santos. Plus, Joanna Jedrzejczyk returned to face Zhang Weili in an epic rematch. See the main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep906EdwardsvsDiaz
programme.desc: Fan favorite Nate Diaz returned to action taking on surging welterweight contender Leon Rocky Edwards at UFC 263. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their battle in front of a packed house in Glendale, Arizona.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC276AdesanyavsCannonieris
programme.desc: It was a night for Aussies at UFC 276 as Israel Adesanya defended his title against Jared Cannonier and Alexander Volkanovski faced Max Holloway for the third time. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep1
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep23
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep7
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1001VolkanovskivsOrtega
programme.desc: At UFC 266, The Ultimate Fighter coaching rivalry between featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski and Brian Ortega came to a head. Relive the action like never before with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2333
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: 2023 Motul Grand Prix of Japan Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The MotoGP World Championship crowns one of 22 riders lining up on 1000cc prototype bikes capable of producing over 240 horsepower and getting up to speeds of 350kph over 21 Grand Prix races.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2333
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC 294: Makhachev vs. Volkanovski 2
programme.desc: Prelims - On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. In February, the pair met for the first time, engaging in a Fight of the Year candidate that left fans demanding a rematch. Now Makhachev, who has won 12 straight, will attempt to make it two in a row over the Aussie star, who is hungry to even the score with the 155-pound king. Plus, middleweight sensation Khamzat Chimaev welcomes former welterweight champion Kamaru Usman to the division in a fight with serious title implications at 185 pounds

programme.title: UFC 294: Makhachev vs. Volkanovski 2
programme.desc: Main Event - On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep910AdesanyavsPereira
programme.desc: At UFC 281, dominant middleweight champion Israel Adesanya puts his title on the line against longtime rival, Alex Pereira. See both men train and prepare ahead of their matchup in New Yorks Madison Square Garden.

programme.title: UFC The Walk Ep403UsmanvsBurns
programme.desc: In 2021, UFC Welterweight Champion Kamaru Usman took on former teammate and friend Gilbert Burns. Get an in-depth look at both athletes journeys to the Octagon and relive Usmans performance as he cements his place in UFC history.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Yusuff vs. Barboza
programme.desc: Prelims - An elite featherweight talent readying his assault on the Top 10 at 145 pounds, Sodiq Yusuff has one more roadblock in his way in the form of feared striker Edson Barboza, who he meets in the October 14 main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. Capable of ending a fight with one punch, kick, elbow or knee, Brazils Barboza is coming off a memorable knockout of Billy Quarantillo in April, and he has similar plans for Yusuff, whose back-to-back wins over Alex Caceres and Don Shainis have him in prime form.

programme.title: UFC 294: Makhachev vs. Volkanovski 2
programme.desc: Prelims - On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. In February, the pair met for the first time, engaging in a Fight of the Year candidate that left fans demanding a rematch. Now Makhachev, who has won 12 straight, will attempt to make it two in a row over the Aussie star, who is hungry to even the score with the 155-pound king. Plus, middleweight sensation Khamzat Chimaev welcomes former welterweight champion Kamaru Usman to the division in a fight with serious title implications at 185 pounds
